channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Lelo Ora 3 Review: A Tongue Stimulator
item.description: Lelo’s Ora 3 is an oral sex stimulator that doesn’t rely on suction air technology.

item.title: 7 Best Coffee Concentrates for Instant Caffeine (2025)
item.description: Whether you’re into cold brew, a frothy confection, or classic hot coffee, we’ve got a concentrated pick for every sipping style.

item.title: Perplexity sees India as a shortcut in its race against OpenAI
item.description: Perplexity is quietly expanding into India to compete with OpenAI in the next phase of AI adoption.

item.title: Some Cities in China Are Advertising Exclusive Subsidies for Huawei-Powered Cars
item.description: WIRED identified 10 local governments in China that are offering discounts to consumers who choose cars running Huawei software. It’s not always clear...

item.title: ‘Utopian’ city California Forever announces huge tech manufacturing park
item.description: Solano Foundry is a 2,100-acre manufacturing park that can host 40 million square feet of advanced tech manufacturing space.

item.title: ICE Is Getting Unprecedented Access to Medicaid Data

item.title: Microsoft is buying tons of carbon removal from Xprize startup Vaulted Deep
item.description: Microsoft's data center boom has been imperiling its 2030 carbon negative pledge, so the tech giant is turning to Vaulted Deep, which operates like a ...

item.title: Anthropic tightens usage limits for Claude Code – without telling users
item.description: Claude Code users have been hit with unexpectedly restrictive usage limits. The problems, many of which have been aired on Claude Code’s GitHub page, ...

item.title: Hadrian raises $260M to build out automated factories for space and defense parts
item.description: Hadrian wants to revolutionize American manufacturing through automation.

item.title: The Best Meal Replacement Shakes for Total Life Optimization (2025)
item.description: Solve the problem of cooking and chewing food with these full-meal replacement drinks.
